brewery.name: Bad Jimmy's Brewery
brewery.description: In todays world to have great taste in beer you have to go to your craft brewers were beer is actually studied and time is taken to insure the quality and taste is always the same. Supporting your local breweries is a great way to keep wonderful, full flavor ale's and lagers available. Ballard, Wa. will soon be the home to Bad Jimmy's with a tap room for everyone to enjoy the full flavor ale's that we have to offer. Watch for us in your local bars and please let us know what you think of our tasty liquid joy.
